content: Despite the breadth of wearable devices available today, these beta testing partners are pursuing opportunities with Movano, as they believe in our vision to advance the healthcare industry forward with more usable and accessible medical devices and it's a huge vote of confidence for a small company like ours. With more than 80,000 website visits and nearly 7,000 consumers who have messaged us to share their excitement about Movano, coupled with the tremendous amount of interest we've received for partnerships and beta opportunities since the announcement of the Movano Ring late last year, it's clear we're building the right product at the right time with the right consumer segment.
